content:
processing GF#13229. Raise hint on any column that has data with a heading that includes 'mapping', and ignoring some common templates like ??? Mapping. Hint list:

Ignored Column quick Mapping in sheet Data Elements in devicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column quick Mapping in sheet Data Elements in deviceusestatement-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column C154 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in immunization-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column V3 Model Mapping in sheet Data Elements in medicationdispense-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column HL7 v2 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in nutritionorder-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column RequestPattern Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column quick Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column Sept2016ServiceRequest Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column OldServiceRequest Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column Notes on R3-ReferalRequest-Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column R3-ReferalRequest-Mapping in sheet Data Elements in servicerequest-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column CDISC define.xml 2.0 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in valueset-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column CMS 1500 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in claim-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column Existing Standard CDAnet v4 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in claim-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column CMS 1500 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in explanationofbenefit-spreadsheet.xml
Ignored Column CMS 1500 Mapping in sheet Data Elements in eligibilityrequest-spreadsheet.xml

@Lloyd McKenzie @Eric Haas @Paul Knapp @Melva Peters. If they are not really errors, you can change the column header to not include 'mapping'. For now, I am doing that to the Immunization and ValueSet items
Which resource(s) in that list did you think were mine?
I'll fix the MedicationDispense one as Melva's on vacation
